      • goUp

        public void goUp(float delta)
        Accelerates the spaceship upward. The acceleration takes into consideration the constant acceleration force and the delta for this simulation step. Also rotates the ship to it's left.
        Parameters:
        delta - Duration of the rotation in seconds.
